item.title: Create md5 from string im Linux
item.description: How to install? Create new file nano /usr/bin/md5 copy&paste code to /usr/bin/md5 chmod: chmod +x /usr/bin/md5 Code: #!/bin/sh if [ $1 ] then hash="$(echo -n "$1" | md5sum )" echo "$hash" else echo "Example usage: md5 <you-string>" fi Usage and Output: root@host:~# md5 sebastian c2d628ba98ed491776c9335e988e2e3bÂ &#8211;
